title: What are Scholarship for engineering students? - Quora

response.answer_text: In India are very few scholarship providing by Govt. for pursing their engineering Study, and its this engineering course are very costly. that’s Why many of students are step-back from their education. If you are looking scholarship for completing their higher education or engineering study, So you can join AIEESE (Primary) Scholarship Examination.  AIEESE (Primary) Scholarship examination provides a platform of support to all engineering Students aspirants by granting them scholarship on qualifying it to pursue engineering education. AIEESE (Primary) are most popular, famous and trusted organization in India, who’s providing scholarship opportunities for engineering Students. It is purely a merit-based scholarship. It is conducted on national level every year, Since 2012. AIEESE (Primary) comes with at least a basic scholarship where candidates can avail a chance to get a laptop or up-to 100% tuition fees.  Read More for Engineering Scholarship: Live Your Dream of Engineering with Scholarship

I Know, you want to become an Engineer. But money is something that pulls you back. Don’t worry now we have a great scholarships in Engineering field for you. AIEESE Secondary is doing great job in this sector. It is helping students in making their dream true. Scholarship criteria is given below.  500 understudies verifying 85% or above imprints in AIEESE (Secondary) are qualified for grant (Tuition charge for full multi year) for examining in any 23 Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) and National Institute of Technology (NIT).1500 understudies verifying imprints more than or equivalent to 75% and under 85% in AIEESE (Secondary) are qualified for grant (Tuition charge for 1 year) for contemplating in any 23 Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) and National Institute of Technology (NIT).3000 understudies verifying imprints more prominent than or equivalent to 65% and under 75% in AIEESE (Secondary) are qualified for grant (Standard Laptop) for examining in any 23 Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) National Institute of Technology (NIT).If you want to get more details -AIEESE (Secondary) scholarship Layout
